website_summaries.verdict: Lauded for its excellent comfort, this reliable kitchen mat offers quality construction alongside fun color options.
pros: High-quality foam is extra-thick to provide utmost comfort and posture support
Waterproof material ensures product's cleanliness and durability
Offered in a variety of different sizes and colors
cons: Many customers remarked on the item's poor packaging during shipment

customer_reviews.title: The things i buy for my cat....
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, no noticeable smells. I chose this original kangaroo mat because i wanted to see if it was better than the no-namebrands i have owned before. It IS. It wont slide around underfoot, but neither will it stick to the floor like a suction cup. When my cats jump from the sink to the hard floor, they could get injured. Elderly cats especialy. Getting a mat for your cat is just good preventative maintenance. Its also nice for human feet. If you found this review helpfull, please press that helpful button to say thanks.
customer_reviews.author: NinjaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Dirt caught and seen in mat texture! Does NOT clean easily!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this mat and it feels nice on my feet and all... but has a HUGE FLAW. I don't understand the high reviews at all - I got black, and any time it gets ANY dirt on it, it is very noticeable! My dog walked in with dirty paws and the dirt gets caught in the texturized surface. Had I known this would happen I wouldn't of bought it. The mat DOES NOT wipe clean at all. I used vinegar which works wonders on everything however this does not wipe clean easily, you have to scrub the dirt out of the little textured sections... VERY annoying. Seriously disappointed. Looking for a new model and will probably return these.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Justine

customer_reviews.title: so they are easy to trip over
customer_reviews.text: these travel - you never find them in the same place you put them. in addition, the edges do not lay flat, so they are easy to trip over. I have had them a while or I would return them.
customer_reviews.author: kay c hutchins

customer_reviews.title: NOT DURABLE! Slit on top w/in a month
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month old and a there is slit down the middle. This is one piece of material (rubber or plastic) on top so it will keep growing with time. So disappointed since I bought three of them and the largest one has the slit. Buy the ones at Costco. I had it for years and just replaced it because it was getting dirty. This was more pricey and didn't last three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: K. D

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful but....
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this mat!! It’s beautiful and comfortable. The biggest issue I have is that they shipped it taped up. The tape left such a bad residue that it took me over an hour on my hands and knees scrubbing to get it off. I used GooGone and WD40 and mineral spirits. There is still slight tape lines and the dust gets stuck to those areas easily. Kind of annoying, hopefully it will go away eventually (I’ve had it for a week).
customer_reviews.author: LindseyT

customer_reviews.title: These slip and slide
customer_reviews.text: We tried to like these, purchased anti-slip pads for underneath, and even contacted customer service. We were told that we should be sure our floors were clean. Aside from the fact this was disrespectful, (and our tile floors are clean/new construction), no other suggestions were offered. Its back to what has always worked for us: GelPro
customer_reviews.author: love2read

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great mat. I put mine in front of the sink because, well let’s face it.......I’m always doing dishes, why not at least be semi comfortable!?! I really like the fact that they have a lifetime warranty (beyond amazon and the 30 days). They seem to strive on customer service, which is a rarity these days. I hope to never have to utilize the warranty, but they get an ‘A’ in my book. Fast shipping! I Will be purchasing another one for in front of my stove. In fact I’m going to do that right now.....bye bye and enjoy😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love it ....I can now stand bare foot at my sink and counter space This is the 24" x 70" mat
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kim Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Easily scratch , cleaning is ok. They slide a lot. Not worth the pricey cost
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: Chemicals galore
customer_reviews.text: The chemical smell lasted for DAYS without letting up even the slightest bit -- even though I kept the mat outside to air out. It gave me a massive headache to be around this thing. I didn't want to subject my child or pet to all the nasty chemicals so I returned it. Too bad, because it without the unbearable stench it seemed to be a decent mat to have under your feet.

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen mats!
customer_reviews.text: Despite being only 3/4 of an inch thick,. this mat is soft and feels so springy! I initially purchased 1 for the area in front of my kitchen sink to make dish washing by hand less uncomfortable. I decided to buy a second mat for the area in front of the stove for cooking. These clean up with a quick wipe from a wet soapy cloth or towel. If you want to give your feet a rest when you cook or do dishes, these are inexpensive mats which provide ample foot support and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Henry N.

customer_reviews.title: Going to upgrade after one year.
customer_reviews.text: I assumed that these were all the same and made out of the same stuff. Having had this for one year I can say that it's better than concrete but I should have spent more for something better. I stand on it about 7-8 hours a day and I get heel and knee pain. I've seen others that cost nearly $100 and they are far superior so I'm tossing this one and spending more. We have one in the kitchen that's from Costco that is still super rubbery while this one has lost its springyness.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Sexcrime

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable feeling when I'm washing the dishes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable feeling when I'm washing the dishes. I went with the color Beige because I have dogs who shed. Love the color, blends in perfectly with my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Very strong toxic smell
customer_reviews.text: I got the mat today, I bought the biggest size for the kitchen. As soon as I opened the box there was coming out a strong odor. I thought that it may happen as it was boxed and put it on the floor in the kitchen. When I came back home after a couple of hours the house was so smelly of toxic odor that I had to open all the windows. The odor doesn’t go away. The web discriprition says that it’s not toxic and phlate free. I don’t know what kind of smell it is but it makes me cough and my nose itchy. Definitely returning it back. Don’t suggest for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for standing desk at work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my standing desk at work. Easy to transition back and forth. I just move the mat and lean against cubicle wall behind my trashcan until I want to stand up and get it back out. Sometimes depending on what shoes I wear I have to stand on it barefoot and I was worried about it making my feet black but it doesn't. Also worried about rubber smell but no strong odor so I love this mat.
customer_reviews.author: vavoom

customer_reviews.title: I hate this mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat arrives scratched and continues to easily scratch. It doesn’t stay in place and constantly slides all over. It’s also really overpriced for what it is. I hate this mat and do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Zebra1246

customer_reviews.title: Edges have lifted; a tripping hazard
customer_reviews.text: Loved (and still love) the comfort of this mat. We've had it less than 3 years and the edge have lifted so that it constantly catches a toe and trips us. The website claims a 10-year warranty "even outside the Amazon warranty" if we contact the manufacturer directly. But I can't find out how to do that ... can't find another website, no information provided by Amazon (that I can find), the "click here" for warranty info just leads back to Amazon's page telling me to contact the manufacturer directly. Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: A Texan

customer_reviews.title: kinda like standing on a rubber eraser
customer_reviews.text: It feels ok without shoes on, kinda like standing on a rubber eraser, not as comfortable as I was hoping for. With shoes on I don't notice a single difference, my feet hurt after just an hour of standing at my desk with this mat. I don't want to have to take off my shoes to use this though. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: someone

customer_reviews.title: Great nice-looking choice for a cushy mat.
customer_reviews.text: Really like these mats/pads. We bought them for our bathroom sink area. Look quite nice and not cheap or plastic or like a commercial kitchen things. The top feels a bit satiny and has a nice material-looking sheen to it. It has retained its softness. We plan to buy another set for our Florida house as well. They stay where we put them and still look good over the weeks, unlike our other fuzzy ones. Wipe clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: BJH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: comfortable to use when I was dishes. easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: catfisherica

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!!! COMFORTABLE, BEST PURCHASE YOU WILL EVER MAKE, UNBELIEVABLE, SPEECHLESS, WISH I FOUND THESE YEARS AGO. WORTH
customer_reviews.text: I have had total knee replacement on both knees, with one not going as planned. Due to car accident at a early age, neck surgery, back surgery, & still have trouble standing for periods of a time but, not with this rug I LOVE LOVE IT! I am happy beyond words. I love to use my kitchen more, & now I can. I am purchasing one for by my stove. I told my husband, PLEASE, can I find this in a shoe or insole ?
customer_reviews.author: Linda McFadden

customer_reviews.title: buy it!
customer_reviews.text: My mom seemed to like it, so that's cool. It's squishy and fun to stand on
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mat
customer_reviews.text: Love these mats I bought the longer one and two of shorter. Definitely help with tired feet. The edges are slanted makes nice foe mopping and fitting under fridge or stove. Everything is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Katherin

customer_reviews.title: and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I, for many, many years, have bought cheap foam mats for in front of my sink. I do dishes here(have never had a dishwasher)and slide the mat over, when I make big salads. I looked on Amazon,and decided to try this one. I'll never have to buy any other...........Yes, it's an investment. But.....I am 65,and am so worth it!!!!!!! I got the grey,and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Boofie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’m actially not sure about the durability just yet since I just received it. However, it is VERY soft, supportive and comfortable. Unlike the more expensive brand I own, it doesn’t seem to have a lot gripping power bc you can slide it, and it creeps with use. However, the more expensive one that I own is NOT nearly as soft, supportive and comfortable as the Kangaroo brand. Also, my old one weighs a ton!! (Ok, not a real ton, but comparatively speaking, it is more than 20x heavier than this Kangaroo brand mat! No one wants a mat that heavy! I think I will replace my old expensive one with one of these!
customer_reviews.author: DrK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and effective
customer_reviews.text: Good support, sturdy materials, looks nice. Not uncomfortable for bare feet, not damaged or marked by shoes. Sometimes my chair's wheels roll onto it and get left there overnight, but I have yet to see this leave a permanent dent or damage the outer material at all. I use this at an adjustable sit/stand desk, and some days I never feel the need to lower my desk at all. As long as I don't lock my knees, this pad takes a lot of the pressure off, and I end the day with minimal ankle swelling - without the pad, I'm worse after only 3 hours of standing.
customer_reviews.author: RRE

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on tile floor
customer_reviews.text: Must be made/sold by same company as Gorilla. Both mats have the same bottom, both simply do not work on tile floor. Both mats slip and slide and do not stay in one place. Both mats seem well made and have nice cushion but the bottom of each will not stay put on tile floor. Needless to say both mats have been returned and our search goes on.
customer_reviews.author: RAR

customer_reviews.title: My favorite kitchen accessory
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking into getting a mat like this for my kitchen sink for the longest time, but I wasn't willing to pay into the $100s for it. I stumbled across this and I was so excited to try it and it quickly became my best friend. The mat fits perfectly into an awkward area and is so thick. I have only had this for a few months so I can't attest to how it holds up long term but if it continues at this rate, I will have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: This had really good reviews and was expecting more
customer_reviews.text: This had really good reviews and was expecting more. I’ve only had a few months and there are stains that won’t come out even though they are supposed to be water resistant. One of them also has the edge coming apart. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Michele M

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: A couple of days after receiving my Kangaroo anti-fatigue mat (24X70" in gray), I bought a second one. The mat is incredibly comfortable to stand on while working in the kitchen. It is very easy to clean, looks great (the gray color blends in nicely with the stainless finish on the appliances), and while it has a non-slip backing it is still very easy to pick up and move around when sweeping the floor. I am also impressed with the communications received from the seller, along with a lifetime guarantee. I have not rated the durability since I've only had it a short time, but I felt comfortable making the purchase because of the guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: EGH

customer_reviews.title: From 1 hour/day at my standing desk to 4+ hours/day
customer_reviews.text: This mat is fantastic. I have an adjustable standing desk at work. Our floor is thin carpet laid on a concrete slab. Before getting the mat, I could only stand for about an hour before my heels and shins starting hurting. With the mat, I can easily go 4 hours before I feel the need to sit down (longer if I'm just wearing socks). The mat is very sturdy. If you accidentally leave a chair wheel or other heavy object on the mat, an indention will form, but it always goes away without any noticeable damage to the mat. I've had the mat for about 4 months now and am still extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Scott Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: We have wood floors and this has been a lifesaver. I put it right in front of the stove because I spend so much time cooking. I was really struggling to stand for so long. My wood floors were causing a ton of leg discomfort. It has disappeared since purchasing this. Honestly, I wish I could make our whole floor this. It doesn't slide around, and isn't so thick we trip over it. Only thing that slightly bothered me was the smell of it. I'm sensitive to smells,so I may not be the best judge. I can't smell it now that we put it onthe floor just when I opened the box
customer_reviews.author: Veronica B

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: This mat proved to be too thick and I found myself having to step up when I used it. I had it in front of my kitchen sink and as I prepared meals, I was on and off the rug constantly causing a tripping hazard. When I stepped onto the mat, I sank into it and felt off-balance. So, it had to go back. I'm very disappointed as it is hard to find a mat for in front of the sink that is wipeable or easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: christine in Northville

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen anti-fatigue mat has everything I was looking for. Nice overall size, 70 x 24, for use in front of sink & food prep area. The edges are beveled well, so that it does not create a trip hazard - a nice smooth transition. The mat does not slide around. Stays safely in place. Nicely cushioned. The mocha color is a nice, warm color that reminds me of rich milk chocolate!
customer_reviews.author: PMG

customer_reviews.title: Not good for my back
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me. I felt unstable when I was on it. Also my chair couldn’t roll over it easily for when I wanted to sit down.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: This mat is Ah-mazing!
customer_reviews.text: With the demise of our25 year old dishwasher, I am now washing dishes by hand until it is replaced. It’s just my husband, two cats and me so we don’t have a lot of dishes, but standing at the sink can be uncomfortable for any length of time. A friend suggested I get a cushioned floor mat. My search brought me to this Kangaroo Mat. With the cushiony 3/4 depth, having to step up to the sink has a new meaning now. This Mat is Ah-mazing! So comfortable and bouncy! I want to cover my whole kitchen floor with these! Until I do, this mat is sure to be moved from place to place as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Cat

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for feet but kind of hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I am a hairdresser and stand for 8 hours a day. I have a 100% reduction in pain in my feet after using this mat. It’s easy to move and very lightweight. My only issue is it’s very hard to get hair off of, its some kind of like sticky rubber. Absolutely saved my feet, I can go home most nights after work and walk my dog for over an hour.
customer_reviews.author: LeGreta

customer_reviews.title: The comfort stand
customer_reviews.text: I can't say anything too bad about these mats, except that when I approach the mat I'm not always looking down at my feet and I have come close to tripping on it when approaching the area I've placed them. That scares me because I recently have had both hips replaced and currently have a knee thing going on. I don't want to turn anyone off these because I'm sure once you get use to having them around you probably automatically become aware that you need to slightly step up onto them. I had considered ordering two more larger mats, and I'm not sure whether that will happen,
customer_reviews.author: d koch

customer_reviews.title: Does not clean well
customer_reviews.text: I was gentle with the two mats I purchased (beige). One got a small hole soon after purchase and both are very difficult to clean. Dirt gets stuck in the grooves and I cannot get them really clean despite trying many products, soaking, etc. Nice to stand on while doing the dishes or cooking but I would buy in another color or another brand.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find Blue!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find Blue! 3/4" thick great on the feet. Bought this for my mom for in front of her stove. This is the second one I've bought for her kitchen, the first one she put in her sewing room instead. The next one will be for a work area in her basement where she is standing on concrete. I have two 4 footers in my own kitchen. Love finding a product so good that you can use it for several gift giving occasions (ie. birthday, mothers day, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Drue

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastically!
customer_reviews.text: I work at a hotel reception/front desk where we are required to stand at the desk for 8 hours straight at a time. It was becoming unbareable with just a thin coat of carpet over concrete and shoe inserts were just not doing enough. I bought a set of these(we have 2 desks, I didn't stack them, however that does have me thinking about doing it now). I bought them a couple months ago though and they still have not shown an ounce wear on them and they are just as soft as the day on bought thema and they are stood on almost 24/7. I'm a very happy buyer!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Connell

customer_reviews.title: Great support - prevents achey feet/knees/legs
customer_reviews.text: Greatest mats. Got 2 to use in the kitchen - for tasks that require standing for an extended period of time - my feet/ankles/knees/legs don't ache after standing for so long. Easy to wipe up, doesn't slip and provides excellent cushion. I loved it so much I also bought one for my mom to use. She only has great things to say about it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Busy_momma

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but slides around on a wood floor.
customer_reviews.text: The mat is comfortable to stand on, but it is constantly moving around on our hardwood floor. The product description says 'Grooved underside keeps your mat firmly in place for minimal adjustments', but in my experience this is not true.
customer_reviews.author: Melonhelmet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for standing!
customer_reviews.text: I experienced one of these mats in a friends house and knew immediately I needed one in my new kitchen. I ordered a red one (needed some color) and I am NOT disappointed. Cooking with this underneath my feet makes standing SO much more comfortable. It is worth every dime spent! I'm considering a longer one so I can run it the entire length of my counter and my stove top. Great product, very heavy and durable. If you stand for long times, in the kitchen, at a counter, in the garage, wherever, this is the product for you. You will NOT be disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, my feet and back thank you!
customer_reviews.text: It's great! It really is comfortable and I feel a real difference between this and standing on the floor. I was concerned it will move around (seen this in other reviews), but it stays in place pretty well, I actually have to lift it up sometimes in order to move it (tile floor). Cleans easily. Looks good. Ended up being a bit small for my needs, so sometimes I have to move it slightly between the sink and the working area... should've bought the longer one.
customer_reviews.author: Zen

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat! Better than husband's work anti-fatigue mat!
customer_reviews.text: Right after I ordered this mat, my husband remembered he had an anti-fatigue mat at his work that he wasn't using anymore (for a standing desk). He brought it home and we put them side-by-side. This one, hands down, was the winner. Not only did it look better, but it was much more plush and cushy. I've only had it for a couple weeks, but so far it's not showing any signs of losing its cushiness! This has made a huge difference for my feet when doing dishes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trillium03

customer_reviews.title: Well-made product. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses this at his stand-up desk for work, usually barefoot. This is our second one we've purchased. The first one lasted about a year before the surface began to crack. Keep in mind - at a MINIMUM this is used 8 hours a day, 5 days a week, but he also stands on it any other time he's on his person computer. The pad material is bound to break down over time. We have been extremely satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Paddeelynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the look, color, and feel of this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi H.

customer_reviews.title: Different shaped edges on 70 x 24 and 60 x 20
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 70 x 24 and the 60 x 20. They are both great but I didn’t know they would be different. The 70 x 24 corners are squared where the smaller size has more rounded corners. Since I am using these to make an L in my kitchen work area this is not what I expected. Ordered same color, same company, just different sizes. I thought they would be made the same. I will need to buy anti slip strips for the large one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've had multiple guests comment about how nice it is to stand on these when doing dishes ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these quite a few months ago and because of the cost, decided I would try it out before I tossed it or bought more. I just recently bought two more. I've had multiple guests comment about how nice it is to stand on these when doing dishes or cooking. My one and only complaint is that they are not quiiiiiite non-slip. However, the comfort of these mats makes up for that. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: The Fam Five

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these mats now, one 72" long and one 36". I haven't had them long enough to fully evaluate them, but so far I'm quite happy with them. They are really comfortable. I vacuumed today and it's nice to be able to vacuum them without them sticking to the vacuum like the small kitchen rugs I had in my former kitchen. I mostly got these because my last kitchen area rugs had the rubbery backing come off in tiny pieces the last time I washed them. When I read that they are great for comfort, that was another reason to give them a try. I hope they meet my expectations in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Dickson

customer_reviews.title: necessary in front of sink and 'frig
customer_reviews.text: protects hard wood floor by sink and refrigerator. rugs get dirty with spills and are a nuisance to wash. this just wipes clean, ans is very soft, comfortable, and protective for bare or stocking feet. multiple colors available (ours blue)
customer_reviews.author: R. Terrance Stanton DPM LTC(ret)

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat for in front of my kitchen sink. I don’t spend that much time at the sink but when I do have to hand wash something standing on a cold tile floor was horrible for my back, knees, and feet. This mat has made quite a difference in my pain level from standing in front of the sink. It easily wipes clean and doesn’t absorb water so it doesn’t get smelly. It’s only been a few months but so far it’s holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: I had an inexpensive anti-fatigue mat for several years until it finally fell apart. I ordered this on April 2 and being a prime member, I was quite disappointed when it didn’t arrive until April 23 due to Amazon decided it wasn’t a necessity to be shipped promptly. Putting that aside, this mat is worth the money. I ordered the 60x20 in Mocha for in front of my kitchen sink and the corner of the cabinets where I do my prep. Well made, no tripping on the edges, and very comfortable for standing in the kitchen. Also easy to wipe clean. No little pockets to hold dirt. Very pleased the the Kangaroo mat.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. F.

customer_reviews.title: Gets slippery when wet
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat, but just be careful. I have 3 yr old who loves playing in the sink water. When the water gets underneath the mat, it can slip, causing the adult washing dishes to fall. I had to pull it up and dry both sides before placing it down again. Besides that I definitely recommend this mat. I'd get another for the other side of the kitchen, but it's too expensive. I'm satisfied with the one I have. It's nice, comfy, and big.
customer_reviews.author: ShuJen

customer_reviews.title: Low quality in high traffic
customer_reviews.text: I placed this in front of sink in kitchen and the edges wore down far too quickly. The rubber "rubbed off" within a few months. Although the cushioning is nice, I would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Great standing mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great floor mat. Nice and comfortable underfoot, and because it's available in a range of lengths, it's easy to choose the right size. While I'm very happy overall with the mats (I bought two), my one complaint is that the edges are sloped. I'm sure there's a reason for this, but for my specific application, I would have preferred the mats have vertical edges, as I've got several of them laid out side by side. Still very comfortable, but if you stand/step across the seam, it can be uncomfortable because of the sloped edges. But that's a small complaint compared to the overall increase in comfort standing on these mats.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: After a month or so the mat felt flatter and ...
customer_reviews.text: After a month or so the mat felt flatter and my back and legs hurt when standing on it for longer periods of time. Not impressed, would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great mats!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats! They’re lightweight but very durable. Very soft and cushiony. They also clean up really well. I had some mats that were very expensive, heavy weight. Even though they were cushiony, the edges on them curled to the point I kept tripping on them. I decided on these Kangaroo mats and I live them! Glad I switched!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Benson

customer_reviews.title: This mat is a quality product that looks and performs just exactly as described by the seller.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this mat in my large kitchen... on the tiled floor In front of the sink and dishwasher...A spot that gets lots of drips and splashes. This beautiful mat is not only very attractive but also very comfortable to stand on and so easy to clean, just with the wipe of a damp cloth or even a paper towel! I think it's one of my best buys on Amazon this year and I've had many of those on this great website. I'm so happy with this product, that I'm about to order a second one! Right now in fact !
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly in good shape, it was rolled up (I got the ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly in good shape, it was rolled up (I got the extra long) but there were no creases and it laid down flat immediately! I ordered the brown color as it was the closest to match my wood floors. It has a very slight bit of a brick color to it.. It's a very comfortable mat and if you order the largest size available, it will cover the sink and dishwasher area. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Kangaroo mat is very spongy and great to stand on. I put the rug in front of my washer and dryer because I spend a lot time folding clothes and this rug has made standing on feet a lot easier. great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: treyjacob.

customer_reviews.title: Durable Mats
customer_reviews.text: These mats have endured daily heavy use, they still look great. The size is just right for our small hair salon. It doesn't take too much room and they take the edge off of standing all day. (we have placed them behind each station for each stylists) Other brands have looked tattered at the year mark and these mats still look amazing. I do highly recommend these mats if your looking for durability and a little cush ( other mats might be a little cushier but do not hold up)
customer_reviews.author: lilbees

customer_reviews.title: A great Addition to the Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We just redid our kitchen floor and one of the key issues we had was the number of cuts and dings the previous flooring suffered from knives and pots being dropped. While we went with a much more durable flooring, we also bought the kitchen mat for added protection This really does the job. It is thick enough that even when a kinfe is dropped point first, it doesn't penetrate. It is also REALLY comfortable to stand on. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: WinterArcher

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. At first sight, I thought is was too thick. Nope, it's great! It will slide unless it's up against something. The diamond pattern is small and if food gets squished into it, I will need to take a wet rag or brush to get it out of the grooves. Doesn't happen often so not a big deal to me at all. I can immediately feel the comfort when I step on it. Covers the length of my stove and some counter. Wish I had gotten this brand for my sink area.
customer_reviews.author: Maacje

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: We've been renovating our kitchen, and it previously had carpet. Transitioning to hardwood while pregnant was impossible so I ordered a large 70x24 and I think the smaller one is 30x20. They're very comfy, and give my feet a nice break while cooking, cleaning or just standing in the kitchen. They have real cushion to them! They came with absolutely no creases and were perfect out of the box. They're easy to clean and don't slide around easily. I would recommend these to anyone with a non carpeted area!
customer_reviews.author: kristin wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: So good we ordered another
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the 70 X 24 to replace a mat that was getting kind of ratty in our kitchen. This one is so much better. It is thick and provides an excellent cushion when standing on a hard floor. My wife said she wishes our whole house could have this material as our floors. After a week we ordered the 48 X 20 to put in another area of the kitchen as well. Fast delivery and highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: jwscott23

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time! Product exactly as described! I bought 2, one for floor in front of kitchen sink and the other for in front of the stove. Very easy to clean, about 2 inches thick and pliable, makes standing easier on knees and feet!, no chemical smell when opened and layed completely flat over night (shipped rolled). I wish I would have bought these years ago! Purchased light blue, color true to picture. Will update about wear and tear with use!
customer_reviews.author: cowchippy

customer_reviews.title: Not too Bad
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these mats and mostly they are great. The only thing is that they do not stay put well enough no matter how clean the underside of mat and floor are. They are also not the easiest to clean with the surface texture. My issue today is with the shipping, I ordered the smallest mat and the box was mangled, but this has nothing to do with the fact that the underside of the mat had 2 large scrapes gouging the rubber. It's still useable, but inexcusable. Nothing damaged should be sent out. Especially for the price of these mats.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K. Z. Vogel

customer_reviews.title: My feet are loving this!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I ordered 2 more. My feet are loving the sponginess. Easy to clean and mine didn't smell like chemicals. I think they are worth the money as they save me time and the hassle of cleaning the mats I had before. They did not ship flat despite the note on the package requesting it but seem to be OK.
customer_reviews.author: Emil M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I have never owned any type of rug/mat for my kitchen but wanted to try one. Read the reviews and selected this one. They were not lying, they comfort level is amazing. Cooking on my stove is much more enjoyable. I find myself hopping a little because of all the cushion. I got it in black and love the color. Have not had to clean much but I have wiped it down and that was a breeze. Light weight. Happy Customer here!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Gamez

customer_reviews.title: Refunded/free replacement- Peeling after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Update: I contacted the company because I noticed there was a warranty mentioned in the description. They offered a full refund or replacement. Can’t beat that! Original: I liked it, but after a few months it started peeling. I turned it so it wasn’t too obvious, but now it’s peeling right in the middle. I just got it in April, and I need to throw it away. I think it should last longer for $70.
customer_reviews.author: Swim Mom

customer_reviews.title: Strong Odor/Rubber Smell from Kitchen Mat!
customer_reviews.text: I’m somewhat torn on my review as the product is excellent yet the item has a very strong rubber odor. I’ve aired it out for the past 2 days but the smell is still present. I am honestly surprised more people have not mentioned it in their reviews. As a frame of reference I purchased the Gray colored Kitchen Mat. Wrote to the seller but let’s see what they say about it. Anyone else experiencing the same issue?
customer_reviews.author: Wootang00

customer_reviews.title: My feet love this!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous comfort after feeling the effects of working in the kitchen on hard tile floors. Ordered the 70” to cover as much area as possible, and it stays in place, doesn’t cause anyone to trip with the beveled edges. I was not sure how the color would turn out but found the beige to be perfect because it was more like taupe and not kind of pink like some beiges. The color blends as a neutral instead of being obvious and clashing with other colors. The long mat was shipped flat in a very long box so it was in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: J. Szymanski

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure baby angels made this.
customer_reviews.text: I clearly need to buy like 10 more, because I keep moving it around the house. IT IS SO LIGHT! I've had mats before, and nothing compares to this - they were so heavy and awkward, it was hard to move them. this is light as a feather, but offers so much support. Pretty sure baby angels made this.
customer_reviews.author: out_island_girl

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I had another brand but this was recommended to me as being more comfortable. However it does not lay flat and has caused multiple trips. Today I fell flat out on the adjacent tile floor and am hurting. I had my husband take it out. I wish I could get my money back
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: Cushy comfort floor mat
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing too many laundry room rugs that never stayed in place and were hard to clean, I finally decided to end that cycle & spent the money on a beautiful and solid mat to lay in front of my washer/dryer. It is cushy, simple, stays in place, I love the blue color that was available and I’m very impressed with the quality. Good choice for anywhere you want the cushiony feel underfoot.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Helps with back pain
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any underlying back problems, but have noticed, as I have gotten older, that standing for prolonged periods makes my back sore - less cushioning between discs? This mat does help. Since I can stand for longer periods before my back starts to ache a bit, but not as much as before, it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Retired 2016

customer_reviews.title: Great barefoot and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these mats, one for in front of the sink and another in the laundry room. They are super comfy on my feet. I got the blue one and it's nice because it isn't too bright. It goes well with my light wood floor. These also clean very easily. We got some sticky white substance on it and it wiped right off. It's also nice that it doesn't slide too easily on the floor. I have another rug that is all over the place but this stays in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L Markzon

customer_reviews.title: We had a smaller size and bought this larger one because we love it so much.
customer_reviews.text: These mats are amazing for those who spend a lot of time in the kitchen (or elsewhere). They are super comfortable and soft. We've had another smaller size in front of the sink for years now and it hasn't broken down at all and still works great. We wanted the larger size so pretty much anywhere you stand now has a cushion for your feet. I would definitely recommend these if you are standing up on a hard floor for long amounts of time.
customer_reviews.author: Wraith7n

customer_reviews.title: YES GET IT
customer_reviews.text: I just got my original kangaroo mat to replace a gel version by another brand that I had in my kitchen where I wash dishes, for the past 3 years. I didn't even realize how flattened out and uncomfortable the gel pad had become, until I stepped in the kangaroo pad. What a HUGE DIFFERENCE. The memory foam was like a supportive cloud for my joints to rest on. I love the LIFETIME WARRANTY as well! Thank you for making a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy mat. Very comfortable to stand on
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy mat. Very comfortable to stand on. Liked it so much I ended up buying two for my family and friends. This mat will last much longer than any of the other kitchen mats out there currently available.
customer_reviews.author: Salted37

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mat but came rolled up and damaged.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable mat to stand on but in the description kangaroo says they always ship their mats flat to prevent damage. When mine came it was all rolled up and it has two creases. I will keep it for my utility room and order a different one for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: They slide around easily.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this all 5 starts but I can not because it slides around on my tile floor. It's very comfortable to stand in and very easy to clean. I have grey and I have not dropped anything that has left a stain. The bad part is after cleaning my floor I try to place them about 6 inches from the baseboard because that's where my feet are. They slide across the floor until they hit something that stops them. I realized this quickly, however someone else could easily be hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost. Kitchen fiends will love it.
customer_reviews.text: This floor mat is amazing. Another fun note is that everyone who visits, comments on how much they like it and how nice it is. I have always wanted an anti fatigue mat for my kitchen. I first tried a knock off version that was much less expensive. I sent it back immediately due to poor cushion and horrible chemical odor. This mat came out of the box perfect. They do not roll it to ship it so it’s nice and flat upon arrival. Absolutely no chemical odor. Excellent support and cushion. Easy to clean. Worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy for this chef :/
customer_reviews.text: I haven't owned this long so I have no idea how long this will hold up. But as an anti fatigue mat, yes it is?!!! I love it, it is super comfortable and I will never own a rug for decor, I will keep buying for the comfort of it as I cook all the time!! ***18 months later!!!! It is still in perfect condition and it's still comfortable!! It seems to be durable!! I'd highly recommend this, it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my backache
customer_reviews.text: I put this in front of my kitchen sink, because my back aches when I do dishes. This has helped so much that I will be purchasing 2 more for other areas in my home. Kind of pricey, but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Color is as advertised - got red
customer_reviews.text: Though these rugs are comfortable and easy to clean on top, they DO move and the edges DO lift up. My husband has tripped on them several times and I have to readjust them daily and sometimes several times a day. In addition to this, the back side collects crumbs etc and that has to be vacuumed regularly. I would not buy again and am disappointed, given how much we paid for these.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Passero

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe product. You can easily stumble, fall and get hurt.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two kitchen mats one and a half month ago and regret we did. They were not sitting flush to the floor from the beginning and thought that this was because the way they have been packed. We waited for more than one month hoping that the deformation will go a way but they rolled up more and while walking in the kitchen we stumbled and fell twice on the floor and got hurt. Unfortunately we could not return them because the term for return has expired after one month. This was an expensive product and very unsafe as you can see in the pictures attached. Please compare with the picture advertised by the company on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: duma radu

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awsome mat. Got this after my dog peed on my other one from costco which obsorbed some of it and was unusable. It has great comfort on your feet. I use it for my feet infront of the sink and it does not absorb any water, even after its been left for hours. Quality is great. It has harder plastic at the bottom so it wont fold over. WORTH THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.author: f3z3rs

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.  They slip and the edges curl.
customer_reviews.text: This mat was purchased for our kitchen, as both my wife and I have back issues. From the start, the mats did not stay in place and now the corners are starting to curl up and creating trip points. My order of June 2016 indicated that these mats were guaranteed for 10 years. However, I am wondering if I received the correct product to start with. The name on the underside shows FOAMERA. Either way, I would either request the correct product or my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: I bought one mat to see if it helped with ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one mat to see if it helped with my back pain. It worked so well I bought another one. Then I had to have another and another. It helps my pain and allows me some freedom. I wish I could order them in custom sizes. I would buy more. Ok so I'm writing more greatness. I gave one of the mats to my friend who has bad knees. He loves it!!! He wants his house non carpet areas covered with this. I don't know if that is possible. However, he loves the product.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Campbell

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one and had to turn around and buy another one! Had one from a local company but was not back pain relief like these are! Super easy to clean, looks great in my remodeled kitchen but most important it is AWESOME on my back and feet! Would love to turn my kitchen floor (small) into these! Take too many to do but would love to!
customer_reviews.author: daniel burt

customer_reviews.title: Colors aren’t the same in different sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 48x20 mat in the color “sand” on July 24. I liked it so much that I ordered a second mat in 20x32 in the same color. As you can see from the picture the 2 mats are totally different colors. While I love the comfort and easy clean the colors being off annoys me.
customer_reviews.author: bean1018

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen mat
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, helps with back issues when standing at the sink. My only complaint is that it doesn't stay put - I'm constantly putting it back in its place. I wipe it down every couple of days with a disinfecting wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for my feet and legs.
customer_reviews.text: My Kangaroo mat came in a huge box, it would have been economically better if it came in a box that fit the product. It was delivered flat, so I am pleased with that. I have had the mat only a few days, so I cannot comment on pain relief yet. All in all the mat is the color shown, the size given, comfortable and just what I ordered. It was delivered quickly ( Amazon Prime) as predicted! I would buy this product again from same seller.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Just get it
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching various mats & decided on this one. The thickness, comfort & look of this mat is great. The added bonuses are that it came flat, has a lifetime warranty and has no chemical off-gassing. Just get it, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This mat is super comfortable in front of our kitchen sink and area where we stand a lot preparing food. It also looks nice in front of our white cabinets and on a warm wood floor...we purchased in black, which is the color of our granite counters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture of 2 together.  2 different companies? Returned both.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, but I ordered 2 different sizes to make an L in my kitchen work area. I did not know that one would have more of a square corner and one would have a rounded corner. That why 4 stars. If I had know I would have ordered same size for both. One had kangaroo company name on back (60x20), the 70x24 did not and it was the one that would slide around. Don’t think it was frim same company as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, super cushy. Great color (I chose brown). I ordered two and one Arrived flat as promised so I was able to use it immediately. Very happy. The other, the 72”, arrived rolled which was frustrating. It has been 3 days and I am still waiting for it to flatten out completely. I have a Roomba which struggles slightly with going up the angled side, but seems to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja Mom

product_meta.title: Kangaroo Original Standing Mat Kitchen Rug, Anti Fatigue Comfort Flooring, Phthalate Free, Commercial Grade Pads, Ergonomic Floor Pad for Office Stand Up Desk, 32x20, Navy
feature_bullets: A BETTER WORKING AT HOME EXPERIENCE: Imagine being relaxed while you do the dishes, fold laundry, or work at your standing desk. Make that a reality with the Kangaroo Rug Mat! Designed with the highest-grade materials, our extra thick, ¾” mats were ergonomically engineered to keep you comfortable while standing for prolonged periods of time. The premium quality foam helps to eliminate tension to give you superior support in your kitchen, laundry room, office, or other high-trafficked area.

STYLISH AND BEAUTIFULLY DESIGNED FOR YOUR HOME: Who said your anti-fatigue kitchen rug mat has to be boring? Choose comfort AND style with the large variety of beautiful colors and patterns offered! Complete with a beautifully textured top, our mats are sure to complement just about any individual and unique style. Use in your home or office and give your space a sophisticated upgrade.

THE SAFEST CHOICE FOR YOUR HOME: ALWAYS non-toxic and phthalate free, (unlike some others on the market) making it the top choice for you and your family. The mat’s unique beveled edges help to prevent tripping and slipping, and the foam underside helps keep the mat in place for minimal adjustments. It’s also 100% waterproof and SO easy to clean! Simply wipe down with a damp cloth or vacuum as needed.

SHIPS FLAT, EVERY TIME: Our rug mats always ship flat, so you won’t have to worry about unsightly creases or folds. Your mat will stand the test of time, even when placed in high-trafficked areas of your home or office! That’s because Kangaroo mats are made with premium strength materials that offer strong, durable support and are guaranteed to not bottom out over time.

10-YEAR GUARANTEE: If you are at all unsatisfied with your product, please contact us (through Amazon if past the standard return window) and we will be happy to provide you with your choice of a replacement or refund. Join those who have already made the switch and are enjoying better posture, muscle conditioning and improved overall health and well-being!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars6,999 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
